articles.description: Pakistan host England in the first Test at Multan Cricket Stadium – follow text & score updates plus radio commentary.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England LIVE: first Test, day one, Multan Cricket Stadium – cricket score, radio commentary and text updates

articles.description: Manchester United battled to a hard-earned draw at Aston Villa - but what does it mean for under-pressure manager Erik ten Hag?
articles.title: Erik ten Hag: Has Manchester United manager done enough to avoid the sack?

articles.description: England produced a clinical attacking display in a nine-try win over New Zealand to move closer to retaining their WXV1 title in Canada.
articles.title: New Zealand 31-49 England: Clinical Red Roses hammer New Zealand at WXV

articles.description: Tottenham manager Ange Postecoglou calls his side's collapse against Brighton in the Premier League "probably the worst defeat since I've been here".
articles.title: Brighton 3-2 Tottenham: Boss Ange Postecoglou unhappy with 'worst' Spurs defeat

articles.description: Robert Lewandowski scores a first-half hat-trick as Barcelona re-establish their three-point advantage at the top of La Liga with a comfortable win at Alaves.
articles.title: Deportivo Alaves 0-3 Barcelona: Robert Lewandowski hat-trick regains Barca advantage at top of La Liga

articles.description: Harmanpreet Kaur guides India to a six-wicket win over Pakistan for their first victory of the Women's T20 World Cup.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: India beat Pakistan by six wickets for first win

articles.description: The Minnesota Vikings hold on to claim a 23-17 win in London and deny Aaron Rodgers and the New York Jets a comeback victory.
articles.title: NFL London: Minnesota Vikings hold on for 23-17 win over Aaron Rodgers' New York Jets

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: Pickford, Alexander-Arnold, Kovacic, Saka, Havertz

articles.description: David de Gea saves two penalties as Fiorentina beat AC Milan, Eintracht Frankfurt's Omar Marmoush scores twice against Bayern Munich and Barcelona beat Alaves
articles.title: European football round-up: David de Gea at the double, magical Omar Marmoush, Barca bounce back

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at the significant number of dropped catches at the Women's T20 World Cup so far and the possible explanations.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: Why have there been so many dropped catches?
